Body:
template = """
        <%doc>
            this is a comment
        </%doc>
        <%def name="foo()">
            <%doc>
                this is the foo func
            </%doc>
        </%def>
        """
nodes = Lexer(template).parse()
self._compare(nodes, TemplateNode({}, [Text('\n        ', (1, 1)), Comment(
    """
            this is a comment
        """, (2, 9)), Text(
    '\n        ', (4, 16)), DefTag('def', {'name': 'foo()'}, (5, 9), [Text(
    '\n            ', (5, 28)), Comment(
    """
                this is the foo func
            """, (6, 13)),
    Text('\n        ', (8, 20))]), Text('\n        ', (9, 16))]))
